p: P. graveolens was cultivated in the Research farm of the Federal University of Sergipe, Department of Agronomical Engineering, São Cristóvão municipality, Sergipe State, northeastern Brazil (10°56′ S, 37°05′ W), Brazil. Voucher specimens (ASE-14844) have been deposited in the Federal University of Sergipe Herbarium, CCBS, Biology Department, São Cristóvão, Sergipe, 49100-000, Brazil.
